full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### W4935-21LB01 - Mobile Column Lifts Procurement

#### Key Information

* **Reference Number:** WS3665775578-Doc3697675507
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3665775578
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-31
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-29 @ 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date:** 2022-11-23
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-11-30
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting bids for the supply, delivery, installation and training of eight (8) mobile column lifts for vehicle maintenance at CFB Kingston, Ontario. The procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and other trade agreements.

#### Important Details

* Bidders must demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria.
* Failure to demonstrate compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive.
* Amendment to Response Deadline Closing Time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2022-11-29 by 14:00 EST.

#### Support

For more information, please contact:

Christopher Casale
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Phone: 343-575-5249

#### Tender Documentation

Tender documentation is available on Ariba Discovery at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14506884?extsite=MTQ1MDY4ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14506884?extsite=MTQ1MDY4ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Note that the tender description is only available in English.
